s2_text: Comply with Apple HomeKit technology. You could control it with the Koogeek Home app or Siri voice commands.

s7_text: The switch will automatically cut off when the internal temperature reaches 85Â°C or the current is over 12A.

s9_text: You can set up your Apple TV or iPad as a home hub to control your HomeKit accessories remotely, grant access, and automate your accessories.

s11_text: Adopt industrial-grade IOT chip with low-power consumption from 0.75W to 1 W.
s11_tip2: Inching switch can withstand up to 50,000 times of press and work up to 10 years.
